Package org.apache.spf

Class Summary
DNSProbe This class contains helper to get all neccassary DNS infos that are needed for SPF
IPAddr  
MacroExpand  
ReservedMX This Class is used to get an Array of reserverd MX-Records. .
SPF This class is used to generate a SPF-Test and provided all intressting data.
SPF1Command  
SPF1Data This Class is used as a Container between the other classes.
SPF1Record This class represent the SPF-Record
SPF1RecordTestSuite  
SPF1Utils Class that offer static methods to convert SPF Results and contains all possible results as static Strings.
SPFTestSuite  
 

Exception Summary
ErrorException This Class is used to throw an Exception if a Error was detected.
NeutralException This exception get thrown if a neutral result should be used.
NoneException This exception get thrown if a none result should be used
UnknownException This exception get thrown if the result should be unknown
